Event.Description: [APP][EVENT]Received video aspect ratio event, param1 is %s
[APP][EVENT]Received video size changed event, param1 is %d, param2 is %d
[APP][EVENT]Codec not supported, need switch to SW

Param1.item: Info CpbDpbDelaysPresentFlag: %d, CpbRemovalDelay: %d, DpbOutputDelay: %d, NumClockTs: %d, PictureStructure: %d, PictureStructurePresentFlag: %d

Event.Description: [APP][EVENT]Received analytics info event, AverageDecodeTime is %d, AverageRender is %d, CodecDropNum is %d, CodecErrorsNum is %d, CodecTimeNum is %d, CPULoad is %d, DecodedNum is %d, Frequency is %d, JitterNum is %d, LastTime is %d, MaxFrequency is %d, RenderDropNum is %d, RenderNum is %d, RenderTimeNum is %d, SourceDropNum is %d, SourceTimeNum is %d, TotalCPULoad is %d, WorstDecodeTime is %d, WorstRenderTime is %d.

[APP][EVENT]Received source bitrate adaptation occured event, param1 is %d
[APP][EVENT]Received source seek completed event, param1 is %d, param2 is %s

[APP][EVENT]Received the preferred subtitle language, language is %s

[APP][EVENT]Received adaptive streaming warning event, param1 is %s

[APP][EVENT]Received AD state change event, param1 is %s

Optionitem.Title: Render optimization for BA
Optionitem.Description: Adding second surface optimize video render when BA

Optionitem.Title: Dolby Surround Module
Optionitem.Description: Set to load Dolby Surround module

Optionitem.Title: Performance Data Statistics
Optionitem.Description: Enable or disable video performance data statistics

Optionitem.Title: Subtitle URL
Optionitem.Description: Select subtitle URL to be presented

item.ItemTitle: Select External Subtitle File or URL

Optionitem.Title: Color Type
Optionitem.Description: Enable to use RGB32, disable to use RGB565

Optionitem.Title: Max Buffering Time
Optionitem.Description: Set the maximum length of the source input buffer (ms)

Optionitem.Title: Initial Buffering Time
Optionitem.Description: Set the initial length of the source input buffer (ms)

Optionitem.Title: Playback Buffering Time
Optionitem.Description: Set the buffering time when re-buffering is needed during playback (ms)

Optionitem.Title: Pan and Scan Mode
Optionitem.Description: Set pan and scan mode when switching to full screen

Optionitem.Title: Download
Optionitem.Description: Download the video locally while playing

Optionitem.Title: Enable RTSP HTTP Port
Optionitem.Description: Set to enable RTSP HTTP port

Optionitem.Title: Playback Looping
Optionitem.Description: Set to make video play repeatedly

Optionitem.Title: Enable Subtitle Bounding Box
Optionitem.Description: Set to enable subtitle bounding box

Optionitem.Title: Set Top Percent
Optionitem.Description: Set the top position using percent based on the area of video display. The valid range is 0 to 100.

Optionitem.Title: Set Left Percent
Optionitem.Description: Set the left position using percent based on the area of video display. The valid range is 0 to 100.

Optionitem.Title: Set Bottom Percent
Optionitem.Description: Set the bottom position using percent based on the area of video display. The valid range is 0 to 100.

Optionitem.Title: Set Right Percent
Optionitem.Description: Set the right position using percent based on the area of video display. The valid range is 0 to 100.

Optionitem.Title: Enable Subtitle Auto Adjustment
Optionitem.Description: Enable or disable subtitle auto adjustment

Optionitem.Title: Set Font Size
Optionitem.Description: Set font size, 50 is half of the default size, and 200 is twice the default size.

Optionitem.Title: Set Font Color Opacity
Optionitem.Description: Change color opacity, range is from 50 (semi-transparent) to 100 (opaque)

Optionitem.Title: Enable Font Color List
Optionitem.Description: Set to enable font color list

Optionitem.Title: Enable Background Color Opacity
Optionitem.Description: Set to enable background color Opacity

Optionitem.Title: Set Background Color Opacity
Optionitem.Description: Change background color opacity, range is from 0 (transparent) to 100 (opaque)

Optionitem.Title: Enable Background Color List
Optionitem.Description: Set to enable background color list

Optionitem.Title: Enable Edge Color Opacity
Optionitem.Description: Set to enable edge color opacity

Optionitem.Title: Set Edge Color Opacity
Optionitem.Description: Change edge color opacity, range is from 0 (transparent) to 100 (opaque)

Optionitem.Title: Enable Edge Color List
Optionitem.Description: Set to enable edge color list

Optionitem.Title: Enable Edge Type List
Optionitem.Description: Set to enable edge type list

Optionitem.Title: Enable Window Background Color Opacity
Optionitem.Description: Set to enable window background color opacity

Optionitem.Title: Set Window Background Color Opacity
Optionitem.Description: Change window background color opacity, range is from 0 (transparent) to 100 (opaque)

Optionitem.Title: Enable Window Background Color List
Optionitem.Description: Set to enable window background color list

Optionitem.Title: Lower Bound Bitrate Range
Optionitem.Description: Set lower bound of bitrate range lower bound

item.ItemTitle: Set Lower Bound of Bitrate Range

Optionitem.Title: Upper Bound Bitrate Range
Optionitem.Description: Set upper bound of bitrate range

item.ItemTitle: Set Upper Bound of Bitrate Range

Optionitem.Title: Enable HTTP Retry Timeout
Optionitem.Description: Enable set HTTP connection retry timeout.

Optionitem.Title: Enable HTTP Gzip Request
Optionitem.Description: Enable or disable sending HTTP request with gzip.

Optionitem.Title: Enable SEI Post Process Video
Optionitem.Description: Enable or disable to post process video data with SEI

Optionitem.Title: Enable RTSP Max Socket Error Count
Optionitem.Description: Enable set RTSP max socket error count.

Optionitem.Title: RTSP Max Socket Error Count
Optionitem.Description: Set RTSP max socket error count.

Optionitem.Title: Analytics Display Time
Optionitem.Description: Set analytics display Time(set time to 0 to disable)

Optionitem.Title: Analytics Foundation CUID
Optionitem.Description: Set analytics foundation CUID(can be set blank to disable)

Optionitem.Title: Analytics Foundation Location
Optionitem.Description: Set to enable analytics foundation location

Optionitem.Title: Analytics Agent CUID
Optionitem.Description: Set analytics agent CUID (set as blank to disable)

Optionitem.Title: Keep Last Frame
Optionitem.Description: Enable keep last frame when stop

Optionitem.Title: Seek Precise
Optionitem.Description: Enable seek to new position precise

Optionitem.Title: Query String
Optionitem.Description: Set url query string, refer to the setURLQueryString function in API Reference Manual for the sample format of the query string.

Optionitem.Title: Live Streaming DVR Position
Optionitem.Description: Enable or disable Live Streaming DVR Position
